name: node-falcon
description: Node addon for Falcon 1024 Post Quantum Signature

scripts.install: npx cmake-js clean && npx cmake-js compile
scripts.cmake-clean: npx cmake-js clean && npx cmake-js -d dep/falcon-1024 clean && node script/clean.js
scripts.build-docs: touch ./readme.md && rm ./readme.md && npx typedoc --mode modules --theme markdown --out /mnt/d/dev/node-falcon-1024/docs --readme /mnt/d/dev/node-falcon-1024/readmeHeader/readhead.md /mnt/d/dev/node-falcon-1024/src && npx concat-md --decrease-title-levels ./docs > README.md

author: Anthony Ellison
